name: Unknown Planet: Paint World
description:
This is a project to fund better ones the game is still in pre-alpha and being developed very slowly.  If you would like to help, email me at Glitchcode2447@outlook.com

If you have an idea put it in the comments section all comments will be reviewed and if we like your idea your name (Itch.io or otherwise) will be added the the credits.

Updates:

1.1.1

  • + Added Breaking and placing blocks
  • * Fixed Colors
  • * Fixed Color size
  • * Fixed bug that gets you stuck on random spots of the map

1.2.1

  • + Added Main menu
  • + Added Pause menu

Plans

  • Multiplayer
  • Main menu that fits in
  • Saveable maps
  • More game features
